1.title: Episode 2

episode of.title: In Play with Jimmy Roberts (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: 13-time Emmy winner Jimmy Roberts explores stories of courage, spirit, and drama that involve everyday people doing extraordinary things in every facet of the game. Dive into the life of PGA TOUR professional Jarrod Lyle, who has been diagnosed with acute myeloid leukemia, as he targets a comeback for the 2014 season. Pay homage to the late Harold Ramis, who directed Caddyshack, the most iconic golf movie ever made and learn how retired LPGA tour professional Jane Geddes became Senior Vice President of Operations for the WWE.

2.title: Caddyshack

episode of.title: In Play with Jimmy Roberts (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: 13-time Emmy winner Jimmy Roberts explores stories of courage, spirit, and drama that involve everyday people doing extraordinary things in every facet of the game. Dive into the life of PGA TOUR professional Jarrod Lyle, who has been diagnosed with acute myeloid leukemia, as he targets a comeback for the 2014 season. 3.title: Golden Tee

episode of.title: In Play with Jimmy Roberts (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: 13-time Emmy winner Jimmy Roberts explores stories of courage, spirit, and drama that involve everyday people doing extraordinary things in every facet of the game. Look back on Tom Watson's near historic campaign at the 2009 Open Championship where he just missed becoming the oldest golfer to win a major championship. Learn about Bobbi Lancaster, a 62 year old semi-retired physician and LPGA hopeful who underwent gender reassignment surgery in 2010, transforming a married father of three into a woman. Finally, celebrate the 25th anniversary of Golden Tee, the iconic ...

4.title: Jean Van de Velde

episode of.title: In Play with Jimmy Roberts (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: 13-time Emmy winner Jimmy Roberts explores stories of courage, spirit, and drama that involve everyday people doing extraordinary things in every facet of the game. Featured segments include golf equipment counterfeiting, the infamous Jean Van de Velde, and the "Mysterious" John Montague. Other segments include the Golf Detective and Then and Now.

5.title: The Villages

episode of.title: In Play with Jimmy Roberts (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: 13-time Emmy winner Jimmy Roberts explores stories of courage, spirit, and drama that involve everyday people doing extraordinary things in every facet of the game. Featured segments include The Villages, Florida's hippest retirement community, MLB Hall of Famers and their connection to the game, and a profile on the president of the PGA of America Ted Bishop. Other segments include Will Robins, the Golf Detective, and Then and Now.

1.title: Drawing for Justice/The King's Warehouse/Divots of Depression

episode of.title: In Play with Jimmy Roberts (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: "Golf Vistas From Behind Bars" looks at the work of Valentino Dixon a golf artist imprisoned for a crime he may not have committed. "The King's Warehouse" interviews Arnold Palmer from the warehouse where he stores memorabilia. "Divots of Depression" interviews Christina Kim about her problems with depression.

2.title: Al Geiberger's 59/Kidnapped/Unusual Golf Tournaments

episode of.title: In Play with Jimmy Roberts (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: "Al Geiberger's 59" looks back at the first player to record a 59 on a PGA Tour and views recently discovered video footage of the event. "Kidnapped" examines the kidnapping of Atlanta Constitution editor Reg Murphy and how he used a visualization of Augusta to help get him through the ordeal. "Unusual Golf Tournaments" looks at some strange golf events around the country.

imdb.plot outline: The game of golf is bigger than what we see each week from the professional tours. Every day, normal people are doing extraordinary things. Jimmy Roberts will explore the very best stories from every corner of the game. With 13 Sports Emmy Awards, no one is better at delivering these extraordinary stories of courage, spirit and human drama. Join Jimmy and his team of sports journalists, only on Golf Channel.
